name: African Elephant
fun_fact: Elephants can 'hear' with their feet by detecting vibrations in the ground!

name: Bengal Tiger
fun_fact: A tiger's stripes are unique, just like human fingerprintsâ€”no two tigers have the same pattern!

name: Giant Panda
fun_fact: Despite their diet being 99% bamboo, pandas have the digestive system of a carnivore!

name: Komodo Dragon
fun_fact: Komodo dragons have venom glands that release toxins to lower blood pressure and prevent clotting in their prey!

name: Harpy Eagle
fun_fact: The Harpy Eagle's talons are as large as a grizzly bear's claws, allowing it to snatch up prey as heavy as monkeys!
